entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
